Package DAO

Class MenuItemComponentDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • DAO.MenuItemComponentDAO
  • public class MenuItemComponentDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    The `MenuItemComponentDAO` class provides methods to interact with the menu_item_components table in the database.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      MenuItemComponentDAO​(java.sql.Connection conn)
      Constructs a MenuItemComponentDAO with the specified database connection.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Adds a new menu item component to the database.

      Deletes a menu item component from the database.
      java.util.List<MenuItemComponent> GetAllMenuItemComponents()
      Retrieves all menu item components from the database.
      java.util.List<MenuItemComponent> GetComponentsByMenuItemId​(int menuItemId)
      Retrieves all components for a specific menu item by its ID.
      MenuItemComponent GetMenuItemComponentById​(int menuItemComponentId)
      Retrieves a menu item component by its ID.
      int UpdateMenuItemComponent​(int menuItemComponentId, int newMenuItemId, int newInventoryItemId, int newQuantity)
      Updates an existing menu item component in the database.

      • GetAllMenuItemComponents

        public java.util.List<MenuItemComponent> GetAllMenuItemComponents()
                                                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        Retrieves all menu item components from the database.
        Returns:
        a list of all menu item components
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if a database access error occurs

      • GetMenuItemComponentById

        public MenuItemComponent GetMenuItemComponentById​(int menuItemComponentId)
                                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        Retrieves a menu item component by its ID.
        Parameters:
        menuItemComponentId - the ID of the menu item component to be retrieved
        Returns:
        the menu item component with the specified ID, or null if not found
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if a database access error occurs

      • GetComponentsByMenuItemId

        public java.util.List<MenuItemComponent> GetComponentsByMenuItemId​(int menuItemId)
                                                            throws java.sql.SQLException
        Retrieves all components for a specific menu item by its ID.
        Parameters:
        menuItemId - the ID of the menu item
        Returns:
        a list of components for the specified menu item
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if a database access error occurs

      • AddMenuItemComponent

        public int AddMenuItemComponent​(int menuItemId,
                                int inventoryItemId,
                                int quantity)
                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        Adds a new menu item component to the database.
        Parameters:
        menuItemId - the ID of the menu item
        inventoryItemId - the ID of the inventory item
        quantity - the quantity of the inventory item
        Returns:
        1 if the menu item component was successfully added, 0 otherwise
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if a database access error occurs

      • UpdateMenuItemComponent

        public int UpdateMenuItemComponent​(int menuItemComponentId,
                                   int newMenuItemId,
                                   int newInventoryItemId,
                                   int newQuantity)
                            throws java.sql.SQLException
        Updates an existing menu item component in the database.
        Parameters:
        menuItemComponentId - the ID of the menu item component to be updated
        newMenuItemId - the new menu item ID
        newInventoryItemId - the new inventory item ID
        newQuantity - the new quantity of the inventory item
        Returns:
        1 if the menu item component was successfully updated, 0 otherwise
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if a database access error occurs

      • DeleteMenuItemComponent

        public int DeleteMenuItemComponent​(int menuItemComponentId)
                            throws java.sql.SQLException
        Deletes a menu item component from the database.
        Parameters:
        menuItemComponentId - the ID of the menu item component to be deleted
        Returns:
        1 if the menu item component was successfully deleted, 0 otherwise
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if a database access error occurs
